action.action-desc: Mrs. Lawrence introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permanently increase the limitations on the deduction for start-up and organizational expenditures.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Promote Startups Act of 2017.

section.header: Permanent increase of limitation on deduction for start-up and organizational expenditures

paragraph.text: Section 195(b)(1)(A)(ii) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended—
Section 195(b) of such Code is amended by striking paragraph (3).

subsection.text: Section 248(a)(1)(B) of such Code is amended—
The amendments made by this section shall apply to amounts paid or incurred with respect to—

paragraph.text: in the case of the amendments made by subsection (a), trades or businesses beginning in taxable years beginning after December 31, 2016, and
in the case of the amendments made by subsection (b), corporations the business of which begins in taxable years beginning after such date.
